R

readDictionary(String) - Static method in class mgmt.FileManagement
Breaks down a text file into words and stores them in a HashSet, which represents the dictionary - a collection of most of the words of the respective language.
readDictionaryWeb(String) - Static method in class mgmt.FileManagement
Breaks down a text file from the web into words and stores them in a HashSet, which represents the dictionary - a collection of most of the words of the respective language.
reader(String) - Static method in class util.ParseElement
Checks if a String is a file path, whether the specifies file exists, or a sentence.
removedLetter(String, HashSet<String>) - Static method in class util.Suggestions
Creates correction suggestions by removing a letter from a word
replaceLetterEn(String, HashSet<String>) - Static method in class util.Suggestions
Creates correction suggestions by replacing a letter from an English word with another one.
replaceLetterGr(String, HashSet<String>) - Static method in class util.Suggestions
Creates correction suggestions by replacing a letter from a Greek word with another one.
